content:
Department of Bio-Technology

 To meet the demand for more technical and job-oriented courses, B.Sc. course in Bio-Technology was started in 2003. The department is equipped with a modern laboratory with the facilities to do practicals with advanced biotechnological techniques. A well qualified and knowledge teaching faculties take care of the academic needs of our students. Our staff have published several research papers in reputed journals. The department has produced 25 University rank holders since 2006. The Department conducts various National / State Level Seminars / Workshops periodically.
